dcterms:creator: M. Lyons
S. Akamatsu
M. Kamachi
J. Gyoba
dcterms:description: The s-JAFFE dataset contains 213 grayscale images of 10 Japanese female models. Each image is scored by 60 people on the 6 basic emotions (happiness, sadness, surprise, fear, anger, and disgust) with a five-level scale (1 represents the lowest emotion intensity, while 5 represents the highest emotion intensity). The average score (after normalization) of each emotion is used to represent the emotion distribution.
dcterms:title: s-JAFFE

dcterms:creator: Lijun Yin
Xiaozhou Wei
Yi Sun
Jun Wang
Matthew J Rosato
dcterms:description: The SBU 3DFE dataset contains 2500 images, and the emotion distribution of each image is obtained by the same method as s-JAFFE. A 243-dimensional feature vector is extracted from each image in s-JAFFE and SBU 3DFE by Local Binary Patterns (LBP) method.
dcterms:title: SBU 3DFE
